ComicInfo.Summary:
R.F., Sue, and Big Jack are up to their armpits in tarantulas and vampires! But the true, ghastly secret of the Blood Feud has yet to be revealed. In order to save the town of Spider Creek—and the world—they'll have to make a terrible sacrifice.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Drew Moss (a) & Nick Filardi (c) | 1 | Var | Phantasm Homage Cover | Drew Moss (a), Nick Filardi (c) & Dylan Todd (d) | 2 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2025-01-05 05:30:32. [CVDB516155]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Drew Moss, Dylan Todd, Nick Filardi
ComicInfo.Characters: Big Jack, R.F. Coven, Sue Hatchell
